entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
